name: Shoot 'em Up (LimonluRevani)
description:
Shoot 'em Up is a 2 person made game with external assets.

Currently there is not much to do in our game i just wanted to share with people regardless. We are currently developing actively and your suggestions and critique will be heavily appreciated. I will try to add these thing in the coming days:

-Settings

-Pause Menu

-Explosive Crates

-UI (current ui is horrendous i know)

-Extra Audio

-Getting Wasted while dying like GTA

-Cheats
